page.description: Removes fields from a table. Field_list is a crlf list of fields to be removed.
page.original:
TABLE.DELETE_FIELDS() Syntax TABLE.DELETE_FIELDS( Table_Name as C, Field_List as C ) ArgumentDescription Table_NameThe name of the table that is losing fields. Field_ListA CR-LF delimited list of field(s).
Description The TABLE.DELETE_FIELDS() method deletes fields from an existing table. Field_List is a CR-LF delimited string containing the names of fields to be deleted. All of the existing data in Table_Name is preserved when the fields are deleted (except, or course for the data in the fields being deleted). Example This script deletes several the Lastname field from the Customer Information table. table.delete_fields("Customer Information", "Lastname")
See Also Table Functions and Methods, TABLE.ADD_FIELDS()
